jslib.hideOthersTxt: function (pageContext) { function nullCheck(a) { try { return (typeof a === 'undefined' || a === 'null' || a === '' || a === '-'); } catch (e) { return true; } } try { if (nullCheck(pageContext.subContext) || nullCheck(pageContext.subContext.reasonToReturn)) { return true; } return (!(pageContext.subContext.reasonToReturn === 'othersReturnOrderLineItemReturnReason')); } catch (e) { return true; } }
jslib.hideSerialNumber: function(pageContext) { function nullCheck(a) { try { return (typeof a === 'undefined' || a === 'null' || a === '' || a === '-'); } catch (e) { return true; } } function arrayCheck(a) { try { a = eval(a); return (typeof a !== 'undefined' && Array.isArray(a) && a.length > 0); } catch (e) { return false; } } try { if (nullCheck(pageContext.subContext) || nullCheck(pageContext.subContext.selectedROParts)) { return true; } return (!arrayCheck('pageContext.subContext.selectedROParts')); } catch (e) { return true; } }
jslib.enableAdd: function (pageContext) { function arrayCheck(a) { try { a = eval(a); return (typeof a !== 'undefined' && Array.isArray(a) && a.length > 0); } catch (e) { return false; } } function nullCheck(a) { try { a = eval(a); return (typeof a !== 'undefined' && a !== ''); } catch (e) { return false; } } function arrayListCheck(a) { return (a.reduce((prev, curr) => { return (arrayCheck(prev) && arrayCheck(curr)); })); } function nullListCheck(a) { return (a.reduce((prev, curr) => { return (nullCheck(prev) && nullCheck(curr)); })); } var listOfRequiredArrays = []; var listOfRequiredVars = []; return (arrayCheck('pageContext.subContext.selectedROParts')); }

beforeUpdate.jslib: function(pageContext){function nullCheck(a) { return (typeof a !== 'undefined' && a !== '' && a !== '-'); } function reasonTxtReturn(id) { if (!nullCheck(id)) { return ''; } let reasonOptionValMap = { 'unusedPartReturnOrderLineItemReturnReason': '{%unusedParts}', 'faultyReturnOrderLineItemReturnReason': '{%faulty}', 'oldModelEndOfLifeReturnOrderLineItemReturnReason': '{%oldModelEndOfLife}', 'othersReturnOrderLineItemReturnReason': '{%others}' }; return reasonOptionValMap[id]; } return (reasonTxtReturn(pageContext.subContext.reasonToReturn));}
